notes.text: Bluecrystal Theme: Unify Background theming across different libraries
Date: Japanese emperor calendar support
ManagedObject(-Metadata): aggregation forwarding
PlanningCalendar-accessibility for special dates & appointments
new sap.ui.unified.MonthInterval - initial version
sap.m.DatePicker - new "navigate" event added

sap.m.DatePicker: display 2 calendar types in calendar
sap.m.DateTimePicker: new control
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - Improved text truncation for the calendar appointment
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - non working dates added.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar new features
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: 1 month view for S and M sizes

sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Direct navigation to a date
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Enable drag and drop of appointments

sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Now appointments could be custom sorted
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: One Month view for desktop.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Resizing of appointments is now possible
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: The grouping of overlapping appointments can now be disabled.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Week numbers are now displayed
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Week view.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: add ARIA support

sap.m.PlanningCalendarRow: introducing specialDates aggregation

sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Change header when two months are used

sap.ui.unified.Currency: New stringValue property added
sap.ui.unified.Currency: Provide function getAccessibilityInfo
sap.ui.unified.FileUploader - new aggregation "FileUploaderXHRSettings" added
sap.ui.unified.Menu: Delayed opening of submenus on hover

sap.ui.unifield.Calendar: add disabled dates
sap.ui.unifield.CalendarTimeInterval: new control
unified.FileUploader: Allow processing of files before upload using interface

(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
(Potentially) missing documentation for managed property is fixed.
Corrected shared-config.js path

General shadow fix

QUnit Designtime Library tests in Firefox
